section.name: Build Instructions
section.p: To build Tag Library Documentation Generator, follow these steps:

ol.li: Download and install ant 1.5.1 or greater from http://ant.apache.org/.
Download and install JavaCC 3.2 on your system. You can download JavaCC here: http://javacc.dev.java.net/
Check out the taglibrarydoc source code from java.net. You can do so here: http://taglibrarydoc.dev.java.net/source/browse/taglibrarydoc/
Change your directory to taglibrarydoc and copy the build.properties.sample template to build.properties.
Edit build.properties and set JAVACC_HOME to the directory in which you installed JavaCC.
Run 'ant dist'. A dist directory will be created with tlddoc.jar.
Try a test run with 'ant test'. A out directory will be created with documentation for all the tag libraries in the testcases/ directory.
See the following instructions for how to use the Tag Library Documentation Generator.
